Square or Rectangle
===================

Square_Or_Rectangle provides functions for identifying a shape based on given values

Determining Square or Rectangle
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

The function :func:`source.square_or_rectangle.determine_square_or_rectangle` provides users with a way to provide a set of four sides of a quadrilateral and return the kind of quadrilateral it is ("square", "rectangle", or "invalid")

Square Example
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

>>> from source.square_or_rectangle import determine_square_or_rectangle
>>> determine_square_or_rectangle(2, 2, 2, 2)
'square'



Module Reference
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: source.square_or_rectangle
    :members:
